Name: Baron Herzog Merlot
Wine Description: Fruit forward notes of red cherries, blackberry, and French oak notes of spice and vanilla. The Merlot is medium-bodied and finishes with moderate tannins.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: The Merlot opens with aromas of black currant, fennel, leather and cassis. The palate reveals a dense, full-bodied wine with layers of plum, espresso, brambles and licorice. Firm tannins carry through to a finish of velvety bittersweet.

Name: Nebbiolo Langhe
Wine Description: Medium dark violet color with pale meniscus. Smoke, oak, ripe black fruit, liquorice to the nose. Oak, smoky, black fruit, charcoal palate displaying a medium-plus finish.

Name: Ca' de Calle Gran Reserva Red Blend
Da Vinci Chianti
Wine Description: Purple red and clear in colour. The dominant bouquet is of cherry and fresh red fruits mingled by peppery notes. On the palate the wine is well balanced, ripe and lively with soft and round tannins lingering through the finish.

Name: Moulis-en-Médoc
Wine Description: Sustained purple color. Nose of red fruits, cherry, currant which harmoniously blends with toasted notes. Ample and well balanced wine on the palate with soft tannins and integrated oak.

Name: Viñas de Gain
Wine Description: With a background of red fruit, the seasoned notes perfectly assemble and are highlighted with notes of oak aging.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has ruby red colour verging towards garnet. Intense, fruit-forward, spicy and floral with hints of red berry fruits enriched by delicate spicy notes. Warm, soft and very well balanced.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: Classic aromas of boysenberry and blackberry with a smoky accent dominate the wine, while cranberry, blackberry flavors and refined tannins round out the flavors and finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Established in 1934, Chateau Ste. Michelle pioneered vinifera grape growing in Washington state. Chateau Ste. Michelle combines an ongoing dedication to research with a commitment to classic winemaking traditions. Winemaker Bob Bertheau takes advantage of the company’s vineyard research and innovative winemaking techniques to craft the highest quality wines. The portfolio includes Columbia Valley wines styled to bring out the varietal character of the region; Indian Wells wines from a collection of warmer vineyards; Single Vineyard wines that epitomize the terroir of the winery's best vineyards; Ethos Reserve the winery’s pinnacle tier; and Artist Series, a Bordeaux-style blend styled for power and longevity. The winery is best known for its Riesling, Chardonnay, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Chateau Ste. Michelle wines are crafted at two facilities: The white wines are made at the Woodinville winery near Seattle and the red wines at the Canoe Ridge Estate winery in eastern Washington.

Name: Bordeaux
Wine Description: The aroma is powerful with a lot of frutiness. The taste is soft with a very good amount of tannin and the wine is ideal when served with all types of meat, poultry and cheese.

Name: Sannazzaro Rosso del Molise
Wine Description: Intensively ruby ​​red. It is characterized by an intense bouquet allusions to black currant, black cherries, red fruits and ripe plums. Delicate vanilla notes and nuances of vanilla spices. Full-bodied, it has a pleasant warming effect on the palate. Delicate and rounded tanins result in a body of optimum nature. Excellent balanced and aromatic.

Name: Malbec Terroir Valle de Uco
Wine Description: A deep ruby Malbec offering a nose of plum, boysenberry and cherry, with hints of dried herbs and mint. The palate is round and smooth with added raspberry, nut and chocolate nuances. Balanced acid and tannin with a fresh finish make this wine ready to enjoy now.

Name: Prestige Blaye - Côtes de Bordeaux
Wine Description: Dark blackcurrant, blackberry, slate and earthy aromas. The palate has a silky texture, nice dark fruit acidity and an overall layer of dark fruit. There is a veil of tannin, but it does not take anything away from clean and fruit focused finish.

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ripe berries and lush vanilla back aromatics thick with cherries and black currant fruit. The opulent palate is reminiscent of classic Martin Ray Cabernet Sauvignon. This bright and robust wine with superb balance and structure is full of wild berry flavors that extend into an elegant finish.

Name: Bourgogne Rouge
Winery: Domaine Pillot et Laurent Romain - Jean Michel et Laurent Pillot

Name: Jeunesse Black Muscat
Wine Description: Soft, silky and a beautiful deep red, Jeunesse Black Muscat gives top notes of pear and pineapple. Rich fruit flavors and a semi-sweet finish pairs nicely with spicy dishes, dark chocolate and orange pound cake. Fresh and aromatic, this wine is perfectly “Jeunesse” – French for youthful, flavorful and fun! Enjoy chilled.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Intense garnet red colour rich and composite bouquet of sweet spices, dried flowers, leather and undergrowth harmonious, well structured with elegant tannins and great balance and complexity elegant and powerful wine at the same time.

Name: Starda Langhe
Wine Description: The nose expresses dark roasted coffee, cherry and subtle violet aromas. In the mouth it is velvety and plush with flavors of red cherry and rhubarb tart, dark loamy earth all layered with hints of vanilla, baking spice, pomegranate.

Name: Dark Red Blend
Wine Description: Exhibits notes of ripe black cherries, blackberry jam, and raspberry cobbler. Hints of vanilla with touches of mocha and spice balance the fruit-forward flavor profile. The wine is finishes with a pronounced chocolate and berry sweetness, sure to delight any wine lover.

Name: Yogev Cabernet Sauvignon ( יוגב קברנה סוביניון )
Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Dark red/black in color, the nose gives an immediate aroma of raspberries and warm baking spices, leading into cassis and clove. The palate has elements of pie crust, with smooth, silky tannins and well balanced acidity.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Silky and medium bodied, with layers of red fruit complemented by aromas of spice and vanilla leading to a long silky finish.

Name: Chianti Colli Senesi
Wine Description: Very good medium feel with nice tones of red cherries, crushed berries.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Aromas of dark fruits and currants with a balance of earthy and deep berry flavors and a cocoa finish.

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: Dark red violet in colour. On the nose ripe currant, red berry and herbal notes. A tasty, herbaceous, berry and cassis palate with a medium finish.

Name: Barolo Lecinquevigne
Wine Description: An intense fragrance of rose, leather, tobacco, and subtle hints of violet and tar.The taste is broad and encompassing, leaving a compelling sensation of softness in the mouth, with a long and persistent finish.

Name: Mountain Cuvée
Wine Description: A serious yet easy-drinking red blend, loaded with lush black plum, blackberry, and creamy cocoa flavors, with accents of smoke and black tea. Juicy, creamy and round mouthfeel with soft tannins supporting generous fruit. The long finish is full of dense berries and mocha flavors.

Name: Gigondas
Wine Description: Beautiful purple in colour. Intense nose with dominant stone fruits and liquorice. On the palate generous, powerful and full-bodied with a long finish.

Name: Le Prieuré
Wine Description: This is a bright and intense ruby-red wine, with an exotic, fruity aroma with notes of liquorice and spice. Made from Cinsault, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon, it is a classic yet supple wine, perfect for daily consumption.

Name: Yarden Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ripe blackberry and cherry fruit notes, complemented by characters of pipe tobacco, black tea and a hint of fresh herb. Rich and complex, this classic Cabernet displays full body and a lingering finish.

Name: Uncaged Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Unfolds with rich aromas of black cherry, cola and mocha. Bold tannins frame a powerful mid-palate layered with mouth-filling flavors of ripe blackberry, black currant and chocolate covered cherry, as well as subtle hints of baking spice. Smooth and balanced, an elegant finesse defines the long and lingering finish.

Name: Yogev Cabernet Sauvignon - Shiraz ( יוגב קברנה סוביניון - שיראז )
Gamay
Wine Description: Ruby-red colored. Intense and persistent on the nose with notes of red fruit. Dry and fresh on the palate with elegant tannins and good sapidity.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Ripe fruit flavors,including Blackberry and plum. the Full mouth reveals soft tannins.

Name: Virgen Vineyards USDA Organic Cabernet Sauvignon
Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It shows great depth and structure. It results in purple hues and a rich texture of velvety tannin in the finish. There are aromas of cherry, blackberry, anise, cocoa and wood smoke, which continue on the palate with the flavor of black cherry.

Name: Yarden Merlot
Wine Description: Aromatic red and black fruit characters with hints of fresh herbs, orange blossom and chocolate. This full-bodied Merlot displays good concentration of flavor and an attractive lingering finish.

Name: Origine Saint-Chinian
Wine Description: Sprinkled with red fruit balanced with spice warmed, the bouquet opens out Generously. Red fruit explodes on the palate, with surprising length.

Name: Rouge
Wine Description: Deep ruby. Aromatic nose with very spicy hints of curry, pepper, nutmeg and green pepper. Delicate and fresh but aromatic in-mouth texture with lingering taste of black fruit and liquorice.

Name: Le Sabbie dell’Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Bright ruby red with lively shades of purple It affords typically mineral, ripe and elegant notes that unfold alternating intense and distinct scents of blackcurrants, prune jam, black cherries, liquorice, pepper and wilted violet Well-balanced and harmonious, it develops with energy and liveliness; it is rich, warm and refined, with suave tannins of extraordinary lineage; the lingering aroma and rewarding and juicy finale are noteworthy.

Name: Rioja Gran Reserva
Wine Description: A deep and shiny ruby red colour. Shows very intense and complex hints of coffee, spices, leather, toastiness that are well integrated with stewed fruit and nuts. Palate is mellow, evolving towards a powerful and structured finish with a long aftertaste. Tannins show sweet, restrained and very well integrated in the wine's structure.

Name: Hot To Trot Smooth Red Blend
Wine Description: At 14 Hands, our winemaker Keith Kenison takes a practical approach to winemaking—really letting the fruit express itself with as few manipulations as possible. Making wines that people enjoy drinking is the ultimate goal, so many decisions are made throughout the winemaking process based purely on taste. In the end result are wines that are smooth and fruit-forward, yet bold and complex.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: It is spicy and floral, red berry fruit notes are enriched by slight floral and spicy hints. Warm, soft on the palate with great structure and round tannins.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Offers aromas of black cherry, leather and spice with layers of rich dark red fruit flavors and a long, smooth, sweet finish.

Name: Napanook
Wine Description: It dark crimson in color, with a fragrant, rich nose full of blackberries and dark forest fruits. The aroma slowly reveals subtle notes of smoky sandalwood, chocolate, and sweet almonds. The entry on the palate is round, but firm; precise and enveloping. Well-balanced tannins open throughout the evolution, and linger on the finish with cherries, cedar and cacao.

Name: Mosaique Red
Wine Description: Deep crimson to black in color, its appealing aromas show lots of spice. Bright and firm acidity up front clean flavors show from start to finish. Notes of Red raspberries, Bing cherry, chocolate, coffee berries, cracked black pepper, and a little minerality peek through finish.

Name: Yogev Cabernet Sauvignon - Merlot ( יוגב קברנה סוביניון - מרלו )
Douro Tinto
Wine Description: Feuerheerd’s Red is a blend that expresses perfectly the Douro wines character. Fruity, well-structured and elegant as Douro wine can be.

Name: Old Vine Malbec
Wine Description: Incredible deep purple red colour. Loads of spice and black and red cherry aromas with notes of chocolate. The berry flavours really pop on the palate as the wine has both a full mid palate and lively acidity that leads to an incredibly long finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Line 39 Cabernet Sauvignon opens with the familiar, bold aromas of a California Cab, which gives way to flavors of blackberry, plum, and currant. Subtle, smooth tannins make this easy-to-drink cabernet sauvignon easy-to-pair with a range of everyday dishes, including Pasta Bolognese and Grilled Burgers.

Name: Contado Aglianico Riserva
Wine Description: Notes of crushed rocks, acacia flowers, almond paste, blackberries, and currants jump from the glass of this opaque ruby/purple-colored offering. Boasting fabulous intensity, medium to full body, beautiful purity, and nicely integrated acidity, wood, and tannin, it was aged in both large neutral oak ovals and smaller barrels.

Name: Il Frappato Sicilia
Wine Description: Red/violet colour. Young and transparent. Intense floral nose. Hints of anise and cherries. Powerful and meaty frappato in the mouth. That means still a lighter bodied red. But great concentration of young fruit. Very fine florality. Darker fruit than normal for the grape. Hints of cherries and anise. Fine ripe fruit.
